text: Tamara Nikolayevna Rylova (; 1 October 1931 - 1 February 2021) was a Russian speed skater. He was born in Vologda, Soviet Union. He won a bronze medal at the 1960 Summer Olympics. Rylova died on 1 February 2021 in Moscow, aged 89.Скончалась советская конькобежка-чемпионка Тамара Рылова ==References== ==Other websites== * Tamara Rylova at SkateResults.com * Results of Soviet Championships at SpeedSkating.ru * Short biography of Tamara Rylova (in Russian) Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union
title: Tamara Rylova
